description.value: Your brood was raised in a resource-rich region, such as the fey-touched forest outside of Great Gwaz, or offworld, perhaps on Castrovel, the Brethedan moon Marata, or Pulonis. You are unaccustomed to going without food and you don't gain the wasteland survivor ability. Instead, you gain 10 Hit Points from your ancestry, rather than 6, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Fast Recovery] general feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites.
